ayas.arabic: ٱقْتَرَبَتِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ وَٱنشَقَّ ٱلْقَمَرُ
ayas.translation: THE HOUR HAS come and split is the moon.
ayas.transliteration: iqtarabatis sā`atu wanshaqqal qamar

ayas.arabic: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ ءَايَةً يُعْرِضُوا۟ وَيَقُولُوا۟ سِحْرٌ مُّسْتَمِرٌّ
ayas.translation: But if they see a sign they turn away, and say: "This is the same old lie continuing,"
ayas.transliteration: wa in yaraw āyatan yu`riḍū wayaqūlū siḥrun mustamirr

ayas.arabic: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
ayas.translation: And deny, and follow their own vain desires; but every matter is determined at its time.
ayas.transliteration: wakadhhabū wattaba`ū ahwā-ahum ۚ wakullu amrin mustaqirr

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ
ayas.translation: Messages deterring them from evil had come to them,
ayas.transliteration: walaqad jā-ahum minal-anbā-i mā fīhi muzdajar

ayas.arabic: حِكْمَةٌۢ بَـٰلِغَةٌ ۖ فَمَا تُغْنِ ٱلنُّذُرُ
ayas.translation: Containing consummate wisdom; yet warnings were of no avail.
ayas.transliteration: ḥikmatun bālighah ۖ famā tughnin nudhur

ayas.arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَىْءٍ نُّكُرٍ
ayas.translation: So turn away from them. When on the Day the crier calls to the painful business,
ayas.transliteration: fatawalla `anhum ۘ yawma yad`ud dā`i ilā shay-in nukur

ayas.arabic: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌ مُّنتَشِرٌ
ayas.translation: They will come out of the graves with downcast eyes like an expanding swarm of locusts.
ayas.transliteration: khushha`an abṣāruhum yakhrujūna minal-ajdāthi ka-annahum jarādun muntashir

ayas.arabic: مُّهْطِعِينَ إِلَى ٱلدَّاعِ ۖ يَقُولُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌ
ayas.translation: They will hasten forward to the caller, gazes fixed. And the unbelievers will say: "This is the day of untold woe."
ayas.transliteration: muhṭi`īna ilad dā` ۖ yaqūlul kāfirūna hādhā yawmun `asir

ayas.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ فَكَذَّبُوا۟ عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا۟ مَجْنُونٌ وَٱزْدُجِرَ
ayas.translation: The people of Noah had denied before them, and had called Our votary a liar, and said: "He is possessed," and repulsed him.
ayas.transliteration: kadhhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin fakadhhabū `abdanā waqālū majnūnun wazdujir

ayas.arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَغْلُوبٌ فَٱنتَصِرْ
ayas.translation: So he prayed to his Lord: "I am helpless, deliver me."
ayas.transliteration: fada`ā rabbahu annī maghlūbun fantaṣir

ayas.arabic: فَفَتَحْنَآ أَبْوَٰبَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَآءٍ مُّنْهَمِرٍ
ayas.translation: And We opened up the flood gates of the sky with water pouring down in torrents,
ayas.transliteration: fafataḥnā abwābas samā-i bimā-in munhamir

ayas.arabic: وَفَجَّرْنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ عُيُونًا فَٱلْتَقَى ٱلْمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمْرٍ قَدْ قُدِرَ
ayas.translation: And We opened up the springs of the earth; and the waters met for a decreed end.
ayas.transliteration: wafajjarnal-arḍa `uyūnan fal taqal mā-u `alā amrin qad qudir

ayas.arabic: وَحَمَلْنَـٰهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْوَٰحٍ وَدُسُرٍ
ayas.translation: But We bore him on a (vessel made) of planks and oakum,
ayas.transliteration: waḥamalnāhu `alā dhāti alwāḥin wadusur

ayas.arabic: تَجْرِى بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَزَآءً لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
ayas.translation: Which sailed right under Our eyes: A recompense for him who had been denied.
ayas.transliteration: tajrī bi-a`yuninā jazā-an liman kāna kufir

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَـٰهَآ ءَايَةً فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
ayas.translation: And We left it as a sign. Is there anyone who will be warned?
ayas.transliteration: walaqad taraknāhā āyatan fahal min muddakir

ayas.arabic: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
ayas.translation: How was then My punishment and My commination!
ayas.transliteration: fakayfa kāna `adhābī wanudhur

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
ayas.translation: Easy have We made the Qur'an to understand: So is there any one who will be warned?
ayas.transliteration: walaqad yassarnal qur-āna lidhhikri fahal min muddakir

ayas.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
ayas.translation: The 'Ad had also disavowed. How was then My punishment and My commination!
ayas.transliteration: kadhhabat `ādun fakayfa kāna `adhābī wanudhur

ayas.arabic: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًا صَرْصَرًا فِى يَوْمِ نَحْسٍ مُّسْتَمِرٍّ
ayas.translation: We let loose against them a violent roaring wind on a day of ill omen, continuous,
ayas.transliteration: innā arsalnā `alayhim rīḥan ṣarṣaran fī yawmi naḥsin mustamirr

ayas.arabic: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ مُّنقَعِرٍ
ayas.translation: Which snatched away men as though they were palm trees pulled out by the roots.
ayas.transliteration: tanzi`un nāsa ka-annahum a`jāzu nakhlin munqa`ir

ayas.arabic: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
ayas.translation: How was then My punishment and My commination!
ayas.transliteration: fakayfa kāna `adhābī wanudhur

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
ayas.translation: Easy have We made the Qur'an to understand: So is there any one who will pay heed?
ayas.transliteration: walaqad yassarnal qur-āna lidhhikri fahal min muddakir

ayas.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
ayas.translation: The Thamud rejected the warnings,
ayas.transliteration: kadhhabat thamūdu bin nudhur

ayas.arabic: فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَبَشَرًا مِّنَّا وَٰحِدًا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذًا لَّفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ وَسُعُرٍ
ayas.translation: And said: "Should we follow only one man among us? In that case we shall he in error and insane.
ayas.transliteration: faqālū abasharan minnā wāḥidan nattabi`uhu innā idhal lafī ḍalālin wasu`ur

ayas.arabic: أَءُلْقِىَ ٱلذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌ
ayas.translation: Was he the one of all of us to have been given the exposition? He is surely an impudent liar."
ayas.transliteration: a-ulqiyadh dhikru `alayhi min bayninā bal huwa kadhhābun ashir

ayas.arabic: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَدًا مَّنِ ٱلْكَذَّابُ ٱلْأَشِرُ
ayas.translation: "Tomorrow they will know who is the impudent liar!
ayas.transliteration: saya`lamūna ghadan manil kadhhābul-ashir

ayas.arabic: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُوا۟ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةً لَّهُمْ فَٱرْتَقِبْهُمْ وَٱصْطَبِرْ
ayas.translation: We shall send the she-camel to try them. So watch them, and be constant.
ayas.transliteration: innā mursilun nāqati fitnatan lahum fartaqibhum waṣṭabir

ayas.arabic: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَنَّ ٱلْمَآءَ قِسْمَةٌۢ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلُّ شِرْبٍ مُّحْتَضَرٌ
ayas.translation: Tell them that the water is to be apportioned between them (and her); and every turn of drinking will be fixed (for each)."
ayas.transliteration: wanabbi-hum annal mā-a qismatun baynahum ۖ kullu shirbin muḥtaḍar

ayas.arabic: فَنَادَوْا۟ صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
ayas.translation: But they called their commander, who seized and hamstrung her.
ayas.transliteration: fanādaw ṣāḥibahum fata`āṭā fa`aqar

ayas.arabic: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
ayas.translation: How was then My punishment of which they had been warned?
ayas.transliteration: fakayfa kāna `adhābī wanudhur

ayas.arabic: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَكَانُوا۟ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلْمُحْتَظِرِ
ayas.translation: We sent a single blast against them, and they were reduced to husks of a decayed fence.
ayas.transliteration: innā arsalnā `alayhim ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan fakānū kahashīmil muḥtaẓir

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
ayas.translation: Easy have We made the Qur'an to understand: So is there any one who will be warned?
ayas.transliteration: walaqad yassarnal qur-āna lidhhikri fahal min muddakir

ayas.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍۭ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
ayas.translation: The people of Lot rejected the warnings.
ayas.transliteration: kadhhabat qawmu lūṭin bin nudhur

ayas.arabic: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ ۖ نَّجَّيْنَـٰهُم بِسَحَرٍ
ayas.translation: We sent a stone-hurtling storm against them, except the family of Lot whom We saved in the early hours of the morning
ayas.transliteration: innā arsalnā `alayhim ḥāṣiban illā āla lūṭ ۖ najjaynāhum bisaḥar

ayas.arabic: نِّعْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى مَن شَكَرَ
ayas.translation: As a favour from Us. That is how We reward the grateful.
ayas.transliteration: ni`matan min `indinā ۚ kadhālika najzī man shakar

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَنذَرَهُم بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا۟ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
ayas.translation: He had warned them of Our might, but they passed over the warnings.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad andharahum baṭshatanā fatamāraw bin nudhur

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ رَٰوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيْفِهِۦ فَطَمَسْنَآ أَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
ayas.translation: They lusted after his guests, so We put out their eyes (and said): "Taste My punishment and My commination."
ayas.transliteration: walaqad rāwadūhu `an ḍayfihi faṭamasnā a`yunahum fadhūqū `adhābī wanudhur

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ صَبَّحَهُم بُكْرَةً عَذَابٌ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
ayas.translation: And early in the morning the decreed punishment came upon them.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad ṣabbaḥahum bukratan `adhābun mustaqirr

ayas.arabic: فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
ayas.translation: So now taste My punishment and My commination!
ayas.transliteration: fadhūqū `adhābī wanudhur

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
ayas.translation: Easy have We made the Qur'an to understand: So is there any one who will be warned?
ayas.transliteration: walaqad yassarnal qur-āna lidhhikri fahal min muddakir

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَ ءَالَ فِرْعَوْنَ ٱلنُّذُرُ
ayas.translation: The warnings came to the people of Pharaoh.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad jā-a āla fir`awnan nudhur

ayas.arabic: كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِيزٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
ayas.translation: They rejected each one of Our signs. So We seized them with the grip of one mighty and powerful.
ayas.transliteration: kadhhabū bi-āyātinā kullihā fa-akhadhnāhum akhdha `azīzin muqtadir

ayas.arabic: أَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكُمْ أَمْ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٌ فِى ٱلزُّبُرِ
ayas.translation: Are the unbelievers among you any better than they? Or is there immunity for you in the Scriptures?
ayas.transliteration: akuffārukum khayrun min ulā-ikum am lakum barā-atun fiz zubur

ayas.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ نَحْنُ جَمِيعٌ مُّنتَصِرٌ
ayas.translation: Or do they say: "We are a well-accoutred army?"
ayas.transliteration: am yaqūlūna naḥnu jamī`un muntaṣir

ayas.arabic: سَيُهْزَمُ ٱلْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ ٱلدُّبُرَ
ayas.translation: The army will be routed and put to flight.
ayas.transliteration: sayuhzamul jam`u wayuwallūnad dubur

ayas.arabic: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدْهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
ayas.translation: Surely the Hour will be the moment of their promise, and that moment will be calamitous and distressing.
ayas.transliteration: balis sā`atu maw`iduhum was sā`atu ad-hā wa-amarr

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ وَسُعُرٍ
ayas.translation: Surely the sinners are misguided and insane.
ayas.transliteration: innal mujrimīna fī ḍalālin wasu`ur

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِى ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُوا۟ مَسَّ سَقَرَ
ayas.translation: On that Day they will be dragged into the fire faces foremost, (and told:) "Taste the feel of Hell."
ayas.transliteration: yawma yus-ḥabūna fin nāri `alā wujūhihim dhūqū massa saqar

ayas.arabic: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَـٰهُ بِقَدَرٍ
ayas.translation: We have indeed created all things by measure;
ayas.transliteration: innā kulla shay-in khalaqnāhu biqadar

ayas.arabic: وَمَآ أَمْرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٌ كَلَمْحٍۭ بِٱلْبَصَرِ
ayas.translation: And Our command is but one (word) swift as the winking of an eye.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā amrunā illā wāḥidatun kalamḥin bil baṣar

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَآ أَشْيَاعَكُمْ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
ayas.translation: We have destroyed the likes of you in the past: So is there any one who will be warned?
ayas.transliteration: walaqad ahlaknā ashyā`akum fahal min muddakir

ayas.arabic: وَكُلُّ شَىْءٍ فَعَلُوهُ فِى ٱلزُّبُرِ
ayas.translation: All things they do are (recorded) in the books;
ayas.transliteration: wakullu shay-in fa`alūhu fiz zubur

ayas.arabic: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٍ وَكَبِيرٍ مُّسْتَطَرٌ
ayas.translation: All things small or great have been written down.
ayas.transliteration: wakullu ṣaghīrin wakabīrin mustaṭar

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَنَهَرٍ
ayas.translation: Surely those who fear God and follow the straight path will be amidst gardens and light,
ayas.transliteration: innal muttaqīna fī jannātin wanahar

ayas.arabic: فِى مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍۭ
ayas.translation: At the still centre in the proximity of the King all-powerful.
ayas.transliteration: fī maq`adi ṣidqin `inda malīkin muqtadir
